summary:
I have 10+ years of experience in the digital marketing arena, with a core focus on performance media and a strong and demonstrated understanding of how to utilise data to drive meaningful business impact. 

I co-founded a digital agency early in my career that would be part acquired by WPP in 2016, and merged into AKQA in 2020. 

I have advised clients on performance media, data strategy, and digital transformation initiatives and have done so internationally for multiple industries, spanning FMCG, Luxury Fashion, Pharma, Tech, and Finance.
